course_title: Principles and Practices of Moral Leadership
class_notes: (THIS CLASS IS FULL; email candlerregistrar@emory.edu to be placed on the waiting list) (Same as ES 560 1)  (ONLINE: synchronous live sessions Wednesday 1:00pm-3:00pm; remaining contact time fulfilled via asynchronous online engagement)
course_description: This course is intended to be a foundational class for the Laney Legacy Program in Moral Leadership and open to students throughout the university and offered annually. Through lectures, seminar discussions, guest presentations and student presentations, we will attempt to understand how some people are able through their modes of being and acting to elevate and transform others and produce desired outcomes.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 4981, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 1-3p, Instructor: R. Franklin, Status: Closed
